titles: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that the sheriffes of London shall be saved and kept harmelesse by the authority of both Houses, for not publishing some late messages and proclamations lately sent them in his Majesties name.

publisher: March 11. Printed at London for John Wright in the Old-bailey,
